start_message:
Hi there! 👋

🤖 I will help you to do some custom automating filtering in you supergroup!

😋 I will automatically forward messages to appropriate topics from the general chat and delete them afteward.

I undestand filters by:
🧑 sender
📰 forwarded-from channel
#️⃣ regexp
🌐 link
🅰️ simple string

Just add it in your super group! 👇
